metadata.Title: CVE-2019-13990 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description:
initDocumentParser in xml/XMLSchedulingDataProcessor.java in TerracottaQuartz Scheduler through 2.3.0 allows XXE attacks via a job description.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-13990` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libquartz2-java - 2.3.0-3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libquartz-java package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
libquartz2-java package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.3.0-3').
